entry.string: When a user has logged in, you can display a search form and logout link for the user by checking this box.
entry.translation: Vhee a user hes lugged in, yuoo cun deespley a seerch furm und luguoot leenk fur zee user by checkeeng thees bux.

entry.string: Show logout box when logged in
entry.translation: Shoo luguoot bux vhee lugged in

entry.string: When the logout block is shown, you can change the display title with this value.
entry.translation: Vhee zee luguoot bluck is shoon, yuoo cun chunge-a zee deespley teetle-a veet thees felooe-a.
